desc: This new textbook in signals and systems provides a pedagogically rich approach to what canÂ commonly be a mathematically dry subject. With features like historical notes, highlighted common mistakes, and applications in controls, communications, and signal processing, Chaparro helps students appreciate the usefulness of the techniques described in the book. Each chapter contains a section with MatLab applications.

details.authors: Luis Chaparro Ph.D. University of California  Berkeley

title: Signals and Systems using MATLAB
